name: Jenn R
review: A huge part of my job is interpersonal, and to be effective I have to have a full range of my face. Having a 'frozen face' from bad or overdone Botox was my biggest fear, but I definitely wanted some help with my frown lines. Devan was kind, patient, and professional. She helped soften the frown lines and it looked natural! No frozen face. Thank you Symmetry Aesthetics! I will be back!!

name: Rickie, R
review: Devan and Marty are absolutely kind, fun, and radiate beauty inside and out. They were realistic and meticulous about each procedure, especially since it was my first time. It looks so natural- people have complimented how pretty and refreshed I look not knowing my little secret.

name: Natalie B.
review: Devan was amazing! She talked me through everything she was going to do and why, which I really appreciated! She's a nurse which made me feel extra comfortable that she knew what she was doing and she also had amazing bedside manner which helped ease my nerves since it was my first time! There was honestly no pain and the service didn't take very long but the results were incredible! It's been almost two months now and my face still looks amazing and super natural. I still have movement in all the right places! My whole experience with her was everything I could have asked for and I can't wait for her to do my lips next!

name: Malika Kenny
review: I love my lash tint! I don't have extremely blonde lashes, but I do like that they can be even darker than they are. It makes my eyes stand out more and I love the way it looks! Now, I just need to add on a bit of mascara for length and I am set.
